sense.name: repair, mend
sense.examples: They charged a lot to fix my car. I'm fixing that tear in your jacket.

sense.name: (cause to) fasten, secure
sense.examples: The cat got out when the latch to the back door wasn't fixed. Let's fix the picture to the frame As he was fixing his hand on her shoulder, she turned at him with an icy glare.

sense.name: specify
sense.examples: See what you get when this variable is fixed to a higher value. We haven't fixed the date for our wedding yet.

sense.name: prepare, make, get ready
sense.examples: She was fixing dinner when the phone rang. Can you fix these samples and send them over to pathology? I was fixing to leave town after I paid the hotel bill.

sense.name: take revenge on
sense.examples: Just wait, I'll fix you! That'll fix him!

sense.name: sterilize
sense.examples: She's going to get her two cats fixed next week.

sense.name: FIX UP:find something/someone or make arrangements for
sense.examples: I'll fix you up with a nice girl. The car salesman fixed me up with a sweet deal. Can you fix up a meeting with the president?
